tool_description: Design QR Code with custom colors for Background, Foreground, eyes and eyeballs.  Choose QR Code Designs for QR Code body, eyes and eyeballs. Display your logo on QR Code.
title: Custom QR Code

api_list.name: Upload Logo
api_list.description:
Upload logo to be displayed on your QR Code. You can also upload logo at following link:
https://www.qrgraphix.com/upload-logo

After download, you will get file name in response.  Send that file name in logo parameter, without #.

api_list.name: Dynamic QR Codes
api_list.description: Generate dynamic QR Codes with custom colors for Qr Code Background, Qr Code Body, eyes and eyeballs.  Choose designs for QR Body, QR eyes and eyeballs. Encode URL, TEXT, EMAIL, PHONE, SMS, VCARD, LOCATION, FACEBOOK, TWITTER, YOUTUBE, WIFI, EVENT, BITCOIN  in your QR Code.

optional_parameters.name: eyeBottomLeft
optional_parameters.description: Hexa Color Code for Bottom Left eye.

optional_parameters.name: eyeTopLeft
optional_parameters.description: Hexa Color Code for Top Left eye.

optional_parameters.name: eyeStyle
optional_parameters.description: eyeStyle : frame1, frame2, frame3, frame4, frame4, frame5, frame6, frame7, frame8, frame9, frame10, frame11

optional_parameters.name: bodyStyle
optional_parameters.description:
Define Qr Code body style from  the styles : diamond, star, 'circle,  dot,  square,  h-line,  v-line, 
 skewed-rect,  rounded-circle,  rounded-rect,  hatched,  atched-rounded,  pointed,  pointed-rounded,  needle,  pointed-diamond, pointed-in,  pointed-in-diamond,  rounded-in,  rounded-in-rounded

optional_parameters.name: bgColor
optional_parameters.description: Hexa Color Code. Please use light color for background.

optional_parameters.name: eyeballStyle
optional_parameters.description: eyeBallStyle : ball1, ball2, ball3, ball4, ball5, ball6, ball7, ball8, ball9, ball10, ball11, ball12, ball13, ball14, ball15

optional_parameters.name: bodyColor
optional_parameters.description: Hexa Color Code. Please use dark colors for Qr Code Body.

optional_parameters.name: eyeTopRight
optional_parameters.description: Hexa Color Code for Top Right eye.

optional_parameters.name: logo
optional_parameters.description:
for using facebook, twitter or whatsapp logo, put #facebook, #twitter, #whatsapp 
otherwise upload logo and use filename, you will get in upload logo API response.

api_list.name: Upload Logo
api_list.description:
Upload logo to be displayed on your QR Code. You can also upload logo at following link:
https://www.qrgraphix.com/upload-logo

After download, you will get file name in response.  Send that file name in logo parameter, without #.
